title: Marketing Manager
description:
General Management, Strategic Planning and Cost Management (50%)
•	Partnering with the Brand Managers
•	Provide constant leadership in managing internal and external brand team and projects day-to-day under the supervision and direction of line manager
•	Provide reports as assigned by line manager/brand
•	Manage marketing schedule on a weekly basis
•	Strategic marketing planning & presentation, and implementation of all marketing activities
•	In-depth familiarization of brand guidelines and company policies
•	Constantly find new ways/channels to promote/market and effectively reach out the target market
•	Manage the cost within the budget approved by line managers, cost-efficiency is reinforced at all times but without sacrificing quality of output
•	Ensure accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of report based on ACFC standard template sent internally or externally, including Marketing Plans, Calendar, Budget, Weekly report, Value proposition, Post mortem report and other pertinent reports as requested by line manager/principal

Brand Activation (30%)
•	Create/execute all programs to achieve channel KPIs (sales volume, market share, OD share, market coverage)
•	Review market developments and customer needs on regular basis
•	Work closely with Marketing team and related departments to develop an effective trade promotion strategy and its activities based on market situation
•	Ensure team members understand and align on the strategy and key objectives
•	Monitor the effectiveness of each trade investment and ensure maximum returns
•	Evaluate all campaigns for further improvement
•	Handle other tasks assigned by manager

Media Relations and PR (20%)
•	Maintain and build relationship with media and lead in deepening the relationship between brand and the media

Position Objectives
-	The Marketing Manager will manage the planning and execution of the seasonal and annual Marketing strategies for Brand within the market. 
-	The Marketing Manager will be responsible for championing Brand in Vietnam while maintaining its integrity and strictly adhering to the tenets of the brand. He or she will also be responsible for staying on top of local competitors, gaining in-depth market understanding – consumer and media landscape, building strategic buzz in the marketplace.
requirements:
•	Minimum 5 years’ experience in same level position, prefer candidates have experience in Retail industry.
•	Minimum 1 year experience in Fashion or Cosmetic
•	Strong reporting skills.
•	Pro-active, adaptive and good follow-through
•	Positive attitude, result oriented, resourceful, innovative
•	Good command of English in writing & speaking
•	Has experience in opening new stores activities and activation
•	Competent in office computer skills
•	Highly committed, passion, well organized, pro-active, honest, integrity, detailed, persevere and diligent
